title: BIP 50: Add 0confirmation to BadgerDAO Annexe
body:
TLDR; 0confirmation joins the Badger Annexe. BadgerDAO will make an investment of ~$1m into 0confirmation, help with full production launch of 0cf Swap, assist with DAO transition, and bootstrap execution of long-term roadmap. BadgerDAO and its community will gain a significant stake in 0cf DAO upon its launch.

High-level deal terms
- $450,000 USDC + $50,000 wBTC (use 7 day twap price) to 0confirmation
     - 100% immediately available
- $450,000 in bBADGER + $50,000 in bDIGG (use 7 day twap price) to  0confirmation
     - 100% locked for 12 months

Details in Forum. Link to discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-50-add-0confirmation-to-badgerdao-annexe/4129/65?u=defifrog
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
